name: Blue Light Filter App - UI/UX Design
description:
Blue Light Filter - Night Mode App UI/UX Design made using Figma.


Blue Light Filter is an app whose objective is very simple: to help you rest better. A blue light filter is used to reduce blue light by adjusting the screen to natural colour.


 *Due to certain limitations, an entirely functioning prototype could not be made. This prototype showcases only some of the many features of the product.
